attributes.action: Make St George's day a Bank Holiday for England
attributes.additional_details: For national pride and celebration  of being English
attributes.background: Make St George's day a Bank Holiday for England

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make Saint David's Day (Wales) and Saint George's Day (England) Bank Holidays
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701833
